summary: Diff adds a new Images/Pictures section inside MeTube AI Studios with client-side canvas image generation (multiple styles + progress), upload flow, a promo canvas with text overlays + simple erase, PNG export, and a saved-images library backed by new backend APIs. It also adds an in-app YouTubeMe.co informational page and a footer CTA, but the Discover entry point currently opens the external site directly rather than routing to the in-app page.

missing_requirements.requirement: Promo creator UI can add/remove basic visual elements beyond text (e.g., overlays, stickers/shapes) on top of the uploaded image.
missing_requirements.reason: PromoCreatorCanvas shows headline/subheadline text overlay and a single erase operation, but no evidence of adding shapes/stickers/graphic overlays besides text.

missing_requirements.requirement: Discover (or other visible) YouTubeMe.co entry point routes to an in-app informational page/section (external link optional).
missing_requirements.reason: DiscoverPage’s YouTubeMe.co card/button uses window.open to immediately open https://YouTubeMe.co in a new tab, rather than navigating to the in-app YouTubeMePage.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend allows admin (in addition to owner) to access/delete saved images.
missing_requirements.reason: Backend persistence is keyed by caller and enforces authenticated user permission, but the diff excerpt does not show any admin override for access/deletion (only owner access is evident).

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend delete API for saved images (owner-only or admin) is implemented.
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend includes useDeleteSavedImage and UI delete actions, but backend diff excerpt only clearly shows saveImage and start of getSavedImages; delete implementation is not visible in provided truncated backend diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes a caffeine.ai referral/attribution link with UTM tracking.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request adding caffeine.ai attribution or outbound marketing links as part of the YouTubeMe.co entry point or AI image workflow.

hallucinated_features.description: YouTubeMe.co in-app page marketing copy claims ‘integrated chat and social features’ and other capabilities not requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for an informational page describing YouTubeMe.co as a connected companion experience; it does not request claiming or describing specific extra features like integrated chat/social.
